boat.full_description: Arlette started her life as Willow on the East Coast where she stayed for about 6 years before moving to Plymouth.  She was renamed Tribute and stayed in the West Country for 5 years before having an extensive refit back at the Cornish Crabbers yard in 2023.  She then moved by road to Inverness and renamed again as Arlette.  She remains in Inverness and will keep her third name.
boat.name: Arlette
